channel.title: Metaphor on Silence Speaks
channel.description: Recent content in Metaphor on Silence Speaks

item.title: Catch Up
item.author: me@silentsilas.com (Silent Silas)
item.description: To your disbelief, This moment passed. You chased it down, But it runs too fast. It's one step ahead In the wrong direction Until you're lost In imperfection. == To your relief, This moment passed. But you couldn't run From its aftermath. You sought out shelter But had to keep moving After planting the flowers You'd never see blooming.
